item.title: Katie add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "There were things I wanted to tell him. But I knew they would hurt him. So I buried them, and let them hurt me." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: Katie add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "She wants to know if I love her, that's all anyone wants from anyone else, not love itself but the knowledge that love is there, like new batteries in the flashlight in the emergency kit in the hall closet." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: Katie add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "I hope that one day you will have the experience of doing something you do not understand for someone you love." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: Katie add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "I regret that it takes a life to learn how to live." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: Katie add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "Why didn't I learn to treat everything like it was the last time. My greatest regret was how much I believed in the future." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: Katie add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "So many people enter and leave your life! Hundreds of thousands of people! You have to keep the door open so they can come in! But it also means you have to let them go!" -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: Katie add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "I felt suddenly shy. I was not used to shy. I was used to shame. Shyness is when you turn your head away from something you want. Shame is when you turn your head away from something you do not want." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: Katie add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "I wish I could freeze this moment, right here, right now and live in it forever." -- Suzanne Collins

item.title: Katie add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "At some point, you have to stop running and turn around and face whoever wants you dead.The hard thing is finding the courage to do it." -- Suzanne Collins

item.title: Katie add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "You love me. Real or not real?" I tell him, "Real." -- Suzanne Collins

item.title: Katie add a quote by John Green
item.description: "Thomas Edison's last words were 'It's very beautiful over there'. I don't know where there is, but I believe it's somewhere, and I hope it's beautiful." -- John Green

item.title: Katie add a quote by John Green
item.description: "The only way out of the labyrinth of suffering is to forgive." -- John Green

item.title: Katie add a quote by John Green
item.description: "When adults say, "Teenagers think they are invincible" with that sly, stupid smile on their faces, they don't know how right they are. We need never be hopeless, because we can never be irreparably broken. We think that we are invincible because we are. We cannot be born, and we cannot die. Like all energy, we can only change shapes and sizes and manifestations. They forget that when they get old. They get scared of losing and failing. But that part of us greater than the sum of our parts cannot begin and cannot end, and so it cannot fail." -- John Green

item.title: Katie add a quote by John Green
item.description: "What is an "instant" death anyway? How long is an instant? Is it one second? Ten? The pain of those seconds must have been awful as her heart burst and her lungs collapsed and there was no air and no blood to her brain and only raw panic. What the hell is instant? Nothing is instant. Instant rice takes five minutes, instant pudding an hour. I doubt that an instant of blinding pain feels particularly instantaneous." -- John Green

item.title: Katie add a quote by Veronica Roth
item.description: "I read somewhere, one, that crying defies scientific explanation. Tears are only meant to lubricate the eyes. There is no real reason for tear glands to overproduce tears at the behest of emotion. I think we cry to release the animal parts of us without losing our humanity. Because inside of me is a beast that snarls, and growls, and strains toward freedom, toward Tobias, and, above all, towards life. And as hard as I try, I cannot kill it." -- Veronica Roth

item.title: Katie add a quote by Veronica Roth
item.description: "Grief is not as heavy as guilt, but it takes more away from you." -- Veronica Roth

item.title: Katie add a quote by Veronica Roth
item.description: "The Candor sing the praises of the truth, but they never tell you how much it costs." -- Veronica Roth

item.title: Katie add a quote by Veronica Roth
item.description: "Do remember, though, that sometimes the people you oppress become mightier than you would like." -- Veronica Roth

item.title: Katie add a quote by Veronica Roth
item.description: "People, I have discovered, are layers and layers of secrets. You believe you know them, that you understand them, but their motives are always hidden from you, buried in their own hearts. You will never know them, but sometimes you decide to trust them." -- Veronica Roth

item.title: Katie add a quote by Veronica Roth
item.description: "No matter how long you train someone to be brave, you never know if they are or not until something real happens." -- Veronica Roth

item.title: Katie add a quote by Veronica Roth
item.description: "We believe in ordinary acts of bravery, in the courage that drives one person to stand up for another." -- Veronica Roth

item.title: Katie add a quote by Veronica Roth
item.description: "A brave man acknowledges the strength of others." -- Veronica Roth

item.title: Katie add a quote by Veronica Roth
item.description: "Becoming fearless isn't the point. That's impossible. It's learning how to control your fear, and how to be free from it." -- Veronica Roth

item.title: Katie add a quote by Veronica Roth
item.description: "Human reason can excuse any evil; that is why it's so important that we don't rely on it." -- Veronica Roth

item.title: Katie add a quote by Veronica Roth
item.description: "Fear doesn't shut you down; it wakes you up. I've seen it. It's fascinating." He releases me but doesn't pull away, his hand grazing my jaw, my neck. "Sometimes I just...want to see it again. Want to see you awake." -- Veronica Roth

item.title: Katie add a quote by Veronica Roth
item.description: "Fear doesn't shut you down; it wakes you up" -- Veronica Roth
